summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3815 for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue from East 43rd Street to East 45th Street; by widening the existing roadway and paving the same, under Ordinance No. 46907, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
